title: Enabler: Implement SOM for Template based definitions
description:
Description
Technical configuration will be realized via SOM to Netrcacker (and MDO).
For doing changes, the external SIM must be read, the data decomposed, changed and sent back to the orchestrator.
The definition of the JSON structure is associated to the catalog specification.
acceptance_criteria: An internal Service Order is forwarded to an external system if the specification is marked 'External'.
The Amazaons TMF Framework is used for communication
The Template / JSON handling functionality is used for generating the order
The order is adapted to the JSON structure and send to the target system
The Inventory entry is marked as external and the corrosponding links are stored in the Inventory
Notifications are recieved and processed for status changes and configuration changes
